backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles and visit entry CRUD with access control checks and per‑caller ownership rules.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two error‑handling features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of major frontend files including forms, lists, analytics, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens, theme variables, and light/dark mode palettes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, user profile setup, tab navigation, and coordinating entry creation and editing.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Analyt: Analytics view computing monthly/yearly totals and rendering summary cards, charts, and empty/loading states.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Spendi: Recharts bar‑chart component displaying hospital and medicine spending with tooltips, legends, and formatted labels.
frontend/src/components/visit/ImportVisi: Dialog component that uploads and parses a CSV of visit records, validates fields, and creates entries via API mutations.
frontend/src/components/visit/MyEntriesL: Displays the user's visit entries with sorting, deletion, export, and import options, handling dialogs and loading states.
frontend/src/components/visit/VisitEntry: Form for creating or editing a visit entry with validation, date handling, and submit logic tied to create/edit mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity state and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identities, status tracking, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and visit entries through the backend actor with error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and a full light/dark theme using OKLCH CSS variables including chart colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/errorMessages.ts: Converts unknown or unsafe errors into short, user‑friendly messages for UI display.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters using both query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/visitEntryAnalytics.t: Calculates sorted monthly and yearly charge totals from VisitEntry data.
frontend/src/utils/visitEntryExport.ts: Generates a CSV from visit entries and triggers a client‑side download.
frontend/src/utils/visitEntryImport.ts: Parses CSV files into validated visit entries, handling dates, numbers, and row‑level errors.
frontend/src/utils/visitEntryPdf.ts: Builds a printable HTML table of visit entries and opens a print dialog for PDF export.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH theme colors, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current build state, features, issues, and versioning for a hospital-visit data entry app. Lists existing implemented features, known bugs, and architectural metadata for planning.
